name: Wave System Concept
description:
In the game, you play as a triangle that destroys incoming enemies that are trying to beat you up.  There are various weapons at your disposal to use (Pistol, AR, Shotgun, Rocket Launcher) to help you defeat the waves of enemies.  The game consists of waves of limited numbers of enemies in which if you clear the map of enemies, the round ends.  There's a lot of missing functionality and bugs as this is just a prototype.  Things such as a health bar for both you and your enemies do not exist (lol).

This was originally a game that was going to turn out like a Rogue-Like, but later evolved into a wave-based combat game.  The wave system I had going in this game was easy to set up and is very easy to transfer throughout games so I kept developing around that idea I had created.  After working around it for a bit longer, I ended up abandoning the project as I had little idea where I wanted it to go and I was getting bored of making it.  

Controls

---------------

WASD - Movement

Right Click - Dash

Left Click - Shoot

1, 2, 3, 4 - Pistol, AR, Shotgun, Rocket Launcher (Respectively)

Esc - Pause Menu
